attributes.additional_details: The government needs to find ways to make the passport application process and delivery of services more efficient. This would be done by finding out what problems each office is facing whether is due to understaffed departments, staff incompetencies, lack of resources etc.
attributes.background:
We request an investigation in to the efficiency of the passport offices.

Many people have waiting for over 10 weeks for their passports. However, there are some who have been waiting for over 6 months. It is difficult to perceive how a passport can take such lengths of time to be processed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608931

We have also published the following related petition, which you might like to sign:

Reimburse all losses from missed travel due to Passport Service delays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616165
